a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
d = c - (b - a)
print(d)
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a - d:
    print(b + c - a + d)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) #input

print(c - (a - b)) #output


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a, end='')
else:
    print(0, end='')

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(max(0, b + c - a))
